searchDocs.title: Startâ€‹
searchDocs.content: </> AvalogServer:Start() â†’Â () Starts Avalog on the server.

searchDocs.title: Configureâ€‹
searchDocs.content: </> AvalogServer:Configure(NewConfig:Â Config) â†’Â () Configures Avalog with the given config.

searchDocs.title: Startâ€‹
searchDocs.content: </> AvalogClient:Start() â†’Â () Starts Avalog on the client.

searchDocs.title: Configureâ€‹
searchDocs.content: </> AvalogClient:Configure(NewConfig:Â Config) â†’Â () Configures Avalog with the given config.

searchDocs.title: ToggleOpenâ€‹
searchDocs.content: </> AvalogClient:ToggleOpen() â†’Â () Toggles whether or not Avalog is open.

searchDocs.title: SetOpenâ€‹
searchDocs.content: </> AvalogClient:SetOpen(Open:Â boolean) â†’Â () Sets whether or not Avalog is open.

searchDocs.title: Configâ€‹
searchDocs.content: </> interface Config { Theme:Â Theme? DataStoreEnabled:Â boolean? AvatarSavingAllowed:Â boolean? Featured:Â {Items:Â {Item}?}? HiddenCoreGui:Â {CoreGuiItem}? Limits:Â {Accessories:Â number?}? EditModes:Â {EditMode}? }

searchDocs.title: CoreGuiItemâ€‹
searchDocs.content: </> type CoreGuiItem = string Valid CoreGui strings: "Chat" | "PlayerList" | "Backpack" | "Captures" | "Emotes" | "TouchControls"

searchDocs.title: Themeâ€‹
searchDocs.content: </> type Theme = Theme The default dark theme can be found here for reference.

searchDocs.title: Opening and closingâ€‹
searchDocs.content: Make use of Avalog:ToggleOpen() and Avalog:SetOpen() as necessary.

searchDocs.title: Featuring itemsâ€‹
searchDocs.content: If you're a UGC creator, you may want to feature items within your homestore or game. Simply call the Avalog:Configure() method and pass in your items like so:  local Avalog = require(PATH_TO_AVALOG) Avalog:Configure({ Featured = { Items = { { -- An item entry Id = 14353423348, -- The item's AssetId ItemType = Enum.AvatarItemType.Asset, -- The item's type - Asset or Bundle }, } } })   To advertise items across Avalog, see Sponsoring.

searchDocs.title: Themingâ€‹
searchDocs.content: Avalog supports a variety of UI theming properties, empowering you to match your world's unique mood and style.  Avalog:Configure({ Theme = { -- Colors = { -- Primary = { -- Main = Color3.fromRGB(255, 255, 255), -- }, -- Base = { -- Main = Color3.fromRGB(0, 0, 0), -- }, -- BaseContent = { -- Main = Color3.fromRGB(255, 255, 255), -- }, -- Neutral = { -- Main = Color3.fromRGB(51, 47, 46), -- }, -- NeutralContent = { -- Main = Color3.fromRGB(196, 196, 195), -- }, -- }, -- Font = { -- Body = "rbxasset://fonts/families/Montserrat.json", -- Heading = "rbxasset://fonts/families/Montserrat.json", -- Monospace = "rbxasset://fonts/families/Montserrat.json", -- }, -- FontWeight = { -- Body = Enum.FontWeight.SemiBold, -- Bold = Enum.FontWeight.Bold, -- Heading = Enum.FontWeight.Bold, -- }, -- TextSize = { -- Base = 17, -- }, -- CornerRadius = { -- Base = 6, -- }, -- StrokeThickness = { -- Base = 1, -- }, -- SpringSpeed = { -- Base = 60, -- }, -- SpringDampening = { -- Base = 1.25, -- }, } })   See the full list of theme properties here.

searchDocs.title: Sponsoring
searchDocs.content: Sponsoring As a UGC creator, you can advertise across Roblox using Avalog. Your items will be listed directly on Avalog's front page. The higher your bid, the higher up your listing will be. Sponsors help Avalog in remaining free and open source, forever. If you're interested in sponsoring, please open a server ticket. ðŸ’Œ

searchDocs.title: Roblox - Easy loaderâ€‹
searchDocs.content: Get the easy loaderInsert it from the ToolboxPlace within ReplicatedStorage

searchDocs.title: Roblox - Manualâ€‹
searchDocs.content: Download the latest rbxmInsert into Roblox StudioCall Avalog:Start() from the server and client

searchDocs.title: Wallyâ€‹
searchDocs.content: warning Wally support is currently dysfunctional due to dependency issues. Please use the rbxm instead.  Copy details from WallyPaste into your wally.tomlRun wally installCall Avalog:Start() from the server and client
